title: STOP GIVING ME SANDSCOURGE SKARNER RIOT
body:
I DONT WANT THIS SKIN
I GOT IT LIKE 3 TIMES IN HEXTECH CRAFTING 
RIOT PLEASE

replies.body: I've got 4 project leonas. i main leona but bought the skin when it came out.
i got regifted amumu from two msi capsules in a row.
Prepare to see it twice in a row now. :P
